name: Case: Connection
description:
• Right click or space to reset. 'M' to mute. Escape to pause.
  • You may have to zoom out or use fullscreen to see the whole window.
  • There are 40-50 puzzles and no save-game.
  • Music: 'Noire #1 - Free Royalty-Free Music' from 'Music By Pedro' on YouTube
  • Marimba sound from Samulis on FreeSound.org
